img_text: WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU STOP HAVING SEX? COME ON! Your immune systenm goes down Your stress levels increase This stress boosts your blood pressure DON'T CRY FOR ME IM ALREADY DEAD And genitals get weaker: Erectile dysfunction and the vagina loses elasticity WHETHER YOU HAVE SEX OR NOT, JUST TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF.
